body_html: @zandaqo, that is right. I just add that Release folder to my Windows path and it worked. However, I tested by launching python my_tensorflow_script.py from a CMD window. I don't know if it work if you use some kind of IDE or iPython.

body: @zandaqo, that is right. I just add that Release folder to my Windows path and it worked. However, I tested by launching python my_tensorflow_script.py from a CMD window. I don't know if it work if you use some kind of IDE or iPython.
